meta.name: Workflow Error Logging and Alerts with Google Sheets and Gmail

parameters.subject: =üö® n8n Error in Workflow "{{ $json.workflow.name }}" (Node: {{ $json.execution.error.context.nodeCause }})

parameters.content:
## SETUP REQUIRED

Workflow Configurations:
- **Copy the Google Sheets structure: [Google Sheets template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11-vLBAKolEvaL0qQDjckHmvC1S6_hxHbgSP8CLyngSs/edit?gid=0#gid=0)**(https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11-vLBAKolEvaL0qQDjckHmvC1S6_hxHbgSP8CLyngSs/edit?gid=0#gid=0)
- Update the Google Sheets document ID to point to your own error logging spreadsheet
- Adjust the Gmail notification recipient email address from "n8n_log_template@yopmail.com" to your preferred address
- Customize the email subject and message format according to your notification preferences

Required Credentials:
- Google Sheets OAuth2 API Credential
- Gmail OAuth2 Credential

## üö® n8n Error Logging to Google Sheets with Gmail Alerts

What This Template Does:

- Automatically triggers whenever any workflow in your n8n instance encounters an error
- Captures comprehensive error details including workflow information, node details, and execution context
- Logs all error information to a centralized Google Sheets document for tracking and analysis
- Sends immediate email notifications to alert you of workflow failures
- Provides direct links to failed executions for quick troubleshooting and resolution
- Maintains a persistent error history for pattern analysis and system monitoring

## üìã WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW

Step 1: üî¥ Error Trigger automatically activates when any workflow in the n8n instance fails or encounters an error
Step 2: üìä Google Sheets - Create Error Log captures and stores error details in a spreadsheet with columns for:
 - Workflow ID and Name
 - Failed Node Name and ID  
 - Error Timestamp
 - Execution URL for direct access
 - Full error stack trace for debugging
Step 3: üìß Gmail - Send Notification dispatches an immediate email alert containing:
 - Workflow name and failed node information
 - Error type and description
 - Execution ID and direct link to view the failed execution
 - Formatted for quick identification and response
